name: (03/12) Three Kingdom Chess
description:
Month 3 of 12

  • Idea

Asymmetrical three player chess game, featuring local hot-seat multiplayer and network multiplayer.

The HTML5 version can join but not host games. This is due to browser security restrictions.

Disclaimer: Do not share your IP address or accept connections with people you do not know and trust. You are responsible for your own network security. Current Rule Set (v0.4.0 Beta)

  • First player to checkmate another player wins. Checkmate is calculated on the beginning of the checked player's turn.
  • Turn order is blue, red, green.
  • Red and green do not have to ally, but are highly encouraged to.
  • Pawns move and capture by moving one space forward at a time. Pawns automatically promote to a Queen on crossing the enemy river.
  • Knights move one space orthogonal then one space diagonal, jumping over intervening pieces.
  • Bishops move on the diagonal for any number of unblocked spaces.
  • Rooks move on the orthogonal for any number of unblocked spaces.
  • Queens move one space at a time in any direction.
  • Kings move one space at a time in any direction but cannot move into check.
